product_name: Arm & Hammer Bone Shape Dispenser with Biodegradable Waste Bags - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A fun and convenient way to carry doggie waste bags on walks, the Arm & Hammer Bone Shape Dispenser with Biodegradable Waste Bags clips to your dog's leash or to a backpack. Almond-colored plastic "bone" dispenses waste bags one at a time. Includes 24 bags made from biodegradable corn starch; Arm & Hammer baking soda in the bag construction neutralizes odors. The Bone Shape Dispenser with Biodegradable Waste Bags clips to any leash. Closeout.
short_description: A fun and convenient way to carry doggie waste bags on walks, the Arm & Hammer Bone Shape Dispenser with Biodegradable Waste Bags clips to your dog's leash or to a backpack.
